documentation.text:
@title TimeCapsule
 @dev A contract that allows users to store messages with unlock timestamps

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unlock time must be in the future"

arguments.value: Unlock time must be in the future

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unlock time must be in the future"

documentation.text:
@dev Get all messages for the caller
 @return messages Array of all messages (both locked and unlocked)
